description: soldier and woman holding branch standing on small ship with male figure holding trident pushing against shore; crowd of people lower right foreground; wall with arched entrance center ground; ranks of people on shore beyond; two castles in distance one right and one left
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

in plate above image in banner in black: [DESCENTE AUX EK(?)FERS]; UL corner of sheet in black: [378];below image on sheet in black: [ Argument du sixieseme Liure/ Enée arrivé à Cume, visite le Temple d\' Apollon, et l\'antre de la supplie de le/mener voir son pere aux enfers, dontl\'entrée estoit dans les forests voisense./ Elle pour c\'et effectluy commande de chercher \'on Rameau d\'or chaché dans/ les bois pour offrir à Proserpine, d\'inhumer \'on siem compagnon mort, et ...(continued on verso)]; below image in pencil: [Bosse 1-163]
title: Descemte Aux Ek(?)fers
